com.rift.coad.lib.db
Class DBSourceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.db.DBSourceManager

public class DBSourceManager
extends java.lang.Object

This object is responsible for managing the database sources used by the coadunation environments.

addDBSource

public void addDBSource(java.lang.String driverPath,
                        java.lang.String driverClass,
                        java.lang.String jndi,
                        java.util.HashMap env)
                 throws DBException
This method adds a new database source. This method must not be used by any Daemon instances!!!!!

Parameters:
driverPath - The path to the driver library.
driverClass - The driver class to load.
jndi - The name to register this jdbc connection with the jndi.
env - The environment for the jdbc connetion.
Throws:
DBException

addDBSource

public void addDBSource(java.lang.String driverClass,
                        java.lang.String jndi,
                        java.util.HashMap env)
                 throws DBException
This method adds the database source.

Parameters:
driverClass - The driver class to load.
jndi - The name to register this jdbc connection with the jndi.
env - The environment for the jdbc connetion.
Throws:
DBException

removeDBSource

public void removeDBSource(java.lang.String jndi)
                    throws DBException
This method removes the database source from JNDI. It does not unload the library that requires a restart.

Parameters:
jndi - The path to the jndi variable.
Throws:
DBException
